verses.text: \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w passed|strong="H3427"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w between|strong="H0996"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3063"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, Josaphat \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

(\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*: \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* ye not-that \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* Galaad \w is|strong="H3027"\w* ours, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* neglect \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*?)

\w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josaphat: Wilt thou come \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* Galaad?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w As|strong="H1697"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w*, \w so|strong="H1697"\w* art thou: \w my|strong="H3068"\w* people \w and|strong="H3068"\w* thy people \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w one|strong="H1697"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* horsemen, thy horsemen. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w Inquire|strong="H1875"\w*, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, \w this|strong="H1697"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6908"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w men|strong="H0376"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* Galaad \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w fight|strong="H4421"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H0518"\w* forbear? \w They|strong="H0518"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Josaphat \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Is|strong="H0369"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H0369"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* some \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* we \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*?

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josaphat: \w There|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w left|strong="H5750"\w*, \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H0259"\w* \w we|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: Micheas \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jemla; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* doth \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prophesy|strong="H5012"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Josaphat \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w an|strong="H7121"\w* \w eunuch|strong="H5631"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Make|strong="H4116"\w* \w haste|strong="H4116"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w bring|strong="H4116"\w* hither Micheas \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jemla.

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* Josaphat \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Juda, \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* \w each|strong="H0376"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w royal|strong="H4428"\w* \w robes|strong="H0899"\w*, \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w court|strong="H8179"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Sedecias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Chanaana \w made|strong="H6213"\w* himself \w horns|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* shalt thou \w push|strong="H5055"\w* \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* thou \w destroy|strong="H3615"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w prophesied|strong="H5012"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w manner|strong="H3651"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* Galaad, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* Micheas, \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* month \w declare|strong="H1696"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w let|strong="H4994"\w* thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w theirs|strong="H1992"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Micheas \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w As|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* liveth, whatsoever \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

\w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: Micheas, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H0518"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* Galaad \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H0518"\w* forbear? \w He|strong="H0518"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Go|strong="H0935"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7535"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w adjure|strong="H7650"\w* thee \w again|strong="H1696"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w again|strong="H1696"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* thou \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w but|strong="H7535"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w*, \w like|strong="H0834"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w shepherd|strong="H7462"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w These|strong="H0428"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w master|strong="H0113"\w*: \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*.

(\w Then|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Josaphat: \w Did|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* prophesieth \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* always \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*?)

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w added|strong="H0559"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou \w therefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H6635"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*:

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* deceive Achab king \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel, \w that|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* \w may|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w Ramoth|strong="H7433"\w* Galaad? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w spoke|strong="H0559"\w* words \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* manner, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w another|strong="H2088"\w* otherwise.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H5975"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w a|strong="H3318"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* deceive \w him|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w By|strong="H3068"\w* what means?

\w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*. \w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Lord \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Thou shalt deceive \w him|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* shalt \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*: \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w behold|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w lying|strong="H8267"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w here|strong="H2009"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee.
